channel.title: Portforwarding help plz
channel.description:
well i did everything and google ( R U N E L O C U S) says my server is online but my client cant seem to connect to my server, i put my no-ip/ip and doesnt work so i think theres an error with Portforwarding here are pics! so please help me!
Well the DMZ it opens any port for me, like when i enable it any port is open, like port 43594 and all is open. But for some reason my client cant seem to connect. I got a new router. On my old one everything was okay.
Heres a picture of the menu in NAT, maybe it helps. [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/281xvz9.png[/img]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/iddj84.png[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2cmq2dw.png[/img]

item.title: Portforwarding help plz
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

[quote=“Dharma, post:4, topic:394269”][quote author=Joseph246 link=topic=491454.msg3594286#msg3594286 date=1304914300]
dude -.- thats local host, not public

SOMEONE HELP ME
[/quote]

Yeah, it is local host but, you HAVE to login using it. You can NOT login using your no-ip. You use 127.0.0.1 OR 0.0.0.0 and other players use you No-ip.[/quote]

Solved again :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding help plz
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

[quote=“Joseph246, post:3, topic:394269”]dude -.- thats local host, not public

SOMEONE HELP ME[/quote]

Yeah, it is local host but, you HAVE to login using it. You can NOT login using your no-ip. You use 127.0.0.1 OR 0.0.0.0 and other players use you No-ip.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding help plz
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

Yes, your server is online but you need to connect to 127.0.0.1 and players must connect to the Runescape.no-ip.biz
You can go client.java to change it

Read full topic
